message: Life O'Rileytini = 1 part pure Riley Sugarbush maple syrup mixed with 2-3 parts 12 year Macallen Scotch over ice (or just cold).
Hmmm... not sure how I would feel after that one.
You guys should retrieve that case of blue ribbon and treat it to some good whiskey. Try it you'll like it. He'll, you could have a heck of a Life O'Rileytini party with that stash.
Yeah @coudron do those dudes still have it in their garage?
I went looking last time I was there, but didn't have any luck :(
